Reviews.Title: “Don't rush back”
Reviews.Author: Ali B
Reviews.Content: apartments extremely run smell clean broken items appeared clean french windows onto balcony close lock bed comfortable top sheet hot water lasted minutes despite switched overnight towels worn hardly kitchen equipment iron basic kettle highspeed internet cost 45 aed 24 hours barely single bar wifi signal wont returning recommending price cheap basic cleanliness simple comfort isnt expect range

Reviews.Title: “For survival.”

Reviews.Content: reviewers pretty correct tired hotel little attention paid maintenance travel lot im flexible clean bed bathroom clean bathroom shower pads enclosed shower curtain means floor wet mess wont coming studio apartment kitchen stove washing machine toaster etc couldnt imagine extended stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value for a short stay.”

Reviews.Content: hotel tourist hotels looked dusty barren arrived cleaned ready day normally wouldn’t flight prospects heat wasn’t happy happened available thanks friendly happy receptionist perfectly fine bit dark block curtains relentless sun wasn’t overly kitchenette useful linger stay odd smell smelt air conditioning vents cleaned damp dusty odor seeped clothes swimming pool roof nice bizarrely pic pool attendant freaked told stop forbidden pictures reception seats scattered 6 people cabs hotel cab tour driver outside cheap actually lot fun day jeep safari fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Older, threadbare but safe”

Reviews.Content: deal stayed week center short cab ride town restaurant onsite didnt try beg towels kitchen equipped plates cups silverware cutting board refrigerator microwave cant plugged time stay deal dont plan doing sleeping television channel selection minimal tolerant sort okay hereif pass students traveler spends money rooming

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money; but friendly and courteous reception could go a long way”
Reviews.Author: Normala
Reviews.Content: standard ok overall grouse shower attitude smiling front desk reception issue checked phone 3 4 min ignoring gestured sit minutes continued conversation phone check hassle wed booked thru bookingcom hotel passport security payment paid passports wonder cant copies passports hotel copy credit card refused suggestion metro station 15 20 minutes walk hotel walking winter summer shops restaurants plenty walking distance taxies aplenty overall ok trip except front desk service

Reviews.Title: “Great cheap hotel for short stay”
Reviews.Author: ExeterHannah
Reviews.Content: 10 minute taxi ride airport perfectly nice mattress clean adjustable aircon iron hairdryer kitchen 2 hobs microwave kettle toaster washing machine didnt cook cooking utensils equipment limited neighbourhood quiet hotels 24 hour shop hotel 2 minutes walk swimming pool jacuzzi roof didnt looked lovely clean reception staff weren’t particularly helpful tourist attractions rules ramadan visit ramadan illegal eat drink smoke public 4am 7pm tourist restaurants allow secret curtained eating overall hotel price paid £25

Reviews.Title: “Very good basic hotel for cheap prize”

Reviews.Content: complain volume chance button didnt control remote watch tv loud volume volume gym nice inside re athletic practice leave peace personal

Reviews.Title: “it is not really a 4 star hotel - more suited for backpackers”
Reviews.Author: Dori-DD
Reviews.Content: initially booked ourselves five star hotel husband able visa time buy visa emirates counter shopping festival able buy apartment 3 star hotel hotel couple transit hotel entrance bad – pretty basic stay – adjusted sleep tv screen extremely spacious attached kitchen food day surprise informed size difference hotel located bit inside getting taxis bell boy extremely friendly helpful doing 247 doing job unlike lazy staff reception hotel location visit metro close – 10 mins walk taxi pay 8 dhs metro restaurants close indian hotel street lunch indian hotel nice catering people overall basic worth money paid emirates book online hotel extremely cheap backpackers

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive - hence worth it, at least for the location”
Reviews.Author: Sunshinecheer
Reviews.Content: hotel seen days dated tired look beds firm comfortable kitchenette useable single spoon plate staff electric burnt service reasonable constant prodding bathrooms clean towels threadbare ac blast controls bath tub roof pool clean useable location fantastic easily accessible stocked supermarket closeby handy breakfast fairly conclusion dont hopes remember paid happy satisfied

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: Psyprass
Reviews.Content: lot mixed reviews guess luck draw exactly luxury depite advertised 4star hotel budget nice cosy staff polite prompt complexes venture hotel business card lost taxi near al station golden sands hotel cable tv channels english fridge kitchen safe bathrooms werent patches mould shower walls hot water ran afternoon otherwise fine buffet breakfast selection including french toast fruit salad pancakes sausages croissants delicious spite hot food lukewarm hotel gym swimming pool computers printer internet internet slow decently clean dont ours fine overall highly recommended budget travellers

Reviews.Title: “Not Impressed”
Reviews.Author: mighty_zarquan
Reviews.Content: threadbare red carpet entrance steps sign hotel falling apart wait half hour bags brought eventually requests visit front desk closer inspection featured completely broken mattress totally collapsed sharp metal spike sticking requests 2 3 hours changed people prodded mattress actually doing highlights included dangerously exposed wiring moldy tiles shower curtain ineffectual ac sounded truck idling lack pillows towels missing curtains windows didnt shut properly lucky booked single night nb avoid chauffeur driven city tour offered hotel unless looking overpriced white knuckle ride clapped mini van driven rude ignorant dangerous driver

Reviews.Title: “Nice - but far from shops/restaurants”
Reviews.Author: fdeva
Reviews.Content: majority hotels dubai fairly nice accessible decided stay based price hotel clean beds comfy id location hotel short stroll shops seen advertised instead 40 walk main restaurants burjuman shopping center peak summer impossible wed catch taxi instead abit hard discovered walked corner hotel 5 mins wed luck getting wait 20 minutes taxi taxi drivers didnt hotel located apparently changed name recently hotel card terms else service check inout fast tv cable cleaned hotel id recommend based location ive 25 value rating pay taxis walk budget

Reviews.Title: “A 3 star hotel with 5 star service.”
Reviews.Author: raymal4u
Reviews.Content: loved hotel home staff caring brilliant located ideal clean fresh looking nice simple outside whenever wireless net computers cost definatly advise hire car lots hidden charges minor touch try charge access £500 dont hire car dubai using taxi service future
